units.title: Amniotic fluid sampling for organoid derivation
units.text: Fluid sampling to AFO purposes while allowing continuation of pregnancy. The AFO technol- characterization and expansion is implemented within 4–6 weeks, a
units.rationale: Describes the minimally invasive collection of amniotic fluid for organoid culture.

units.title: Flow cytometry sorting of live epithelial cells
units.text: Representative flow strategy utilized to collect the living cell fraction, negative for propidium iodide (PI) and positive for Hoechst.
units.rationale: Specifies the gating criteria for isolating viable epithelial cells by FACS.

units.title: EdU proliferation assay on organoid lines
units.text: EdU assay clonal organoid lines at P6 and P10; n = 1 pediatric small intestinal ileal organoid showing proliferating cells localized at the crypt-like structure bases (scale control; mean ± s.e.m.).
units.rationale: Details the use of EdU labeling to assess cell proliferation in organoids.

units.title: Disaccharidase activity measurement
units.text:
Functional evaluation of disaccharidase activity (n = 2 bar, 50 μm).
Immunofluorescent staining highlights proliferative marker Ki67 (scale bar, paired t-test).
units.rationale: Indicates the functional assay performed to test enzymatic activity of organoids.

units.title: Single‑cell RNA sequencing of amniotic fluid epithelial cells
units.text: Using single-cell sequencing, we investigated human AF epithelial cells 89.7% of AF samples, with a median formation efficiency of
units.rationale: Describes the application of scRNA‑seq to characterize epithelial cell populations.

units.title: Long‑term culture of kidney‑derived fetal organoids (KAFO)
units.text: Phase-contrast images showing long-term KAFO culture (scale bar, 200 μm). n = 5 independent biological samples; mean ± s.e.m.; *P = 0.0121, two-tailed
units.rationale: Documents the maintenance of KAFOs over extended passages.
